titleInfo.title: Country Spotlight with Hank Williams Jr. (16223)

mods.abstract: Two color half sheet (red and black on white) announcing the Country Spotlight no. 5 with Hank Williams Jr., Dolly Paton, Ronnie Millsap, and Billy Craddock at the Dobbyn's Bennett High School Dome on March 14. Poster features metal photoplates of Hank Williams Jr., Dolly Paton, Ronnie Millsap, and Billy Craddock. Poster was printed for job no. 16223. To view the paperwork associated with this poster, see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/20872.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
